entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
